title: Default values are not shown in 'Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing the report and clicking on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
EB: I expected to see the default values displayed in the value box, so that I can easily modify the parameter that I want to change.
SR:
1. Open the report and preview it.
2. Click on the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
3. Observe that the value boxes for all parameters are empty instead of displaying the default values.
4. Attempt to modify one of the parameters and notice that all values have to be inputted again.
